body.name: LENRUE G11 Computer Speakers for Desktop, Touch Lights PC Speakers with Surge Clear Sound, USB C/USB Powered for Computer Desktop PC Laptop Monitor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 41 mins
features: Surge Stereo Sound - 4 large amplifier IC horns! Computer speakers achieved Distortion Free and Noiseless in stunning sound. Immersive cinema effect for movies, videos, games and music.
Touch Angular Game Lights - Unique Dynamic Angular Game Atmosphere design! Desktop speaker with latest One Touch to turn on/off lights, avoid the traditional cumbersome button design.
All In One Compact - Fits any desktop computer! Perfectly under the monitor without taking up any extra desktop space. Cables are glued together to avoid desktop clutter.
Plug And Play - No need for any driver! Plug in the USB powered cable and 3.5mm audio cable to enjoy now! Top volume knob for easier volume adjustment.
Type C Adapter Included & Compatibility - USB speakers match computers, desktops, PCs, laptops, iMacs, MacBooks. Suitable for windows(Vista/7/8/10), Mac OS, Chrome OS, etc.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Power Clear Sound, Volume Knob, Noiseless, Touch Lights

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Power Crisp Clear Sound: High-quality multiple horns for increased volume without distortion. No Current Sound： Increase the shock absorber, even if the standby does not have any noise. Top Knob: Designed to be on top, easy to adjust the volume. Turn on/off the computer speaker. Touch Lights: Newly upgraded one touch to turn off/on the light to avoid the tedium of buttons.

Easy to Setup without Sound 1 - Click Speaker Icon in the taskbar. 2 - Select the " Speaker " as your computer playback device. 3 - Make sure the computer speaker is on and not at minimum volume. 4 - Make sure the computer or other device is not muted or at minimum volume.

Frequently Asked Questions Q: What should I do if there is still noise sound after I turn off my computer? A: Please turn off the computer speaker when not in use or turn the speaker volume knob to the minimum. - Q: What devices can the type c adapter be compatible with? A: Type C adapter is compatible with MacBook Pro after 2016 and MacBook Air after 2018, laptops, tablets, etc. - Q: What kind of service does this speaker have? A: — 60-DAY no reason for a re-fund — 1-Year WarrantyService — Video Operation Guidance

Touch Lights Computer Speakers Specification Power Source USB Audio Source AUX Turn on/off the Light Touch on Top Turn on/off Speakers Konb Product Dimension 2.48 × 14.96 × 2.55inches. （L×W×H） Cable Length Both AUX and USB are upgraded to 47ins extra long for extra wide display. Packaging Includes 1 × Type C Adapter; 1 × Computer Speakers; 1 × Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great PC Speaker at a great price!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this based on the size, appearance, price and the customer reviews.This thing is great! Easy to use, just plug & play.It's nice that the lights can be easily turned off and it has an independent, easy access volume button.It doesn't take up a lot of space either.I highly recommend this sound bar for computer or tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid sound, nice little color
reviews.reviewText: The LENRUE G11 Computer Speakers are like the rockstars of the mini-speaker world – they may not shake the foundations of your desk, but they sure know how to throw a colorful party! Let's start with the sound quality – it's impressive, but if you're expecting bass that can launch your coffee mug into orbit, you might need to recalibrate your caffeine-fueled expectations. These speakers are more Mozart than Metallica when it comes to bass, but hey, your mug will thank you.Now, let's talk about the real headliner – the entertaining lights. These speakers aren't just about the beats; they're about the visual feast! The lights along the edge are like a mood ring for your desk, slowly fading up and cycling through more colors than a chameleon on a Skittles diet. It's like a mini aurora borealis, right there next to your monitor.Pair these rainbow rhythm warriors with a similar light mouse, and your desk becomes the unofficial dance floor of the tech world. Your colleagues (Okay I work alone in my office but you can imagine) might think you're preparing for a disco duel rather than a spreadsheet showdown. To sum this all up the LENRUE G11 speakers may not knock your coffee mug into space, but they sure know how to turn your desk into a sonic rainbow. It's a party for your ears and eyes – who said work can't be a fiesta?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good sound for the money
reviews.reviewText: This speaker bar offers good sound for PC gaming. It is quite small though so don't expect an entirely "surround sound" type of sound bar. It sounds more mono-like than if you had two individual speakers. The bar feels okay for the price. My real only complaint is that the cord is quite short and was hard to cable manage on my desk. The only other thing that bothered me was that RGB lights around the speaker bar are completely random. They all start off red but are programmed to slowly differ from each other so that you'll get a full rainbow effect after awhile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent speaker for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift, the receiver is very happy with the product. Easy set up, and it sounds decent for what it cost

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This was a great buy!!
reviews.reviewText: I love the color spectrum, the sound is great and it looks great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 1. setting up is super easy, just plug both cables in the back of computer and it's done.2. Sound was meh at first, had to go into Audio Console and play with Equalizer a bit to get a decent sound.3. LED light colors are random. One thing really annoys me is LED light automatically turns on every time you power on your pc. I prefer "set it and forget it" instead of having to press a button to turn off the LED every time my PC starts.Overall a decent and nice looking speaker, for the price this low I'm happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Its not very loud.
reviews.reviewText: It would be great it if it was a little louder. I have to have everything maxed out and its still not loud enough sadly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent speaker, does the job, lights are cool
reviews.reviewText: If you're expecting excellent sound quality from a computer speaker, look elsewhere. It does the job. There really isn't anything special about it. The lights look cool but they don't sync with the sound if that's what you might think. It feels like you have to turn the volume knob quite a ways to even get a little bit of sound. It doesn't match up with the volume level painted on the speaker, so there isn't any way to know how high or low the volume is until you play something. (So be careful if you were blaring something the day before - you may have forgotten!) Otherwise, it's a good speaker for the money. I wasn't looking for anything special and it does the job I wanted it for.
